summary: Dyslexia is a learning difference that makes reading and writing hard for some people. It's like the words on a page don't make sense to them, or they might struggle to say the words out loud. This can make schoolwork challenging. Dyslexia isn't about being lazy or not wanting to learn; it's a real difficulty that many people face. It's often noticed when kids start school. Some people think it runs in families. There's no cure, but special teaching methods can help. Many famous people have dyslexia and have done great things!
title: Dyslexia
